name: Secrets of the Titanic
synopsis: Join Eva and her family as they take a cruise on a ship following the same path as the ill-fated Titanic. After wearing her grandmotherâ€™s necklace, Eva starts to experience flashbacks and finds herself onboard the Titanic, not as herself, but as her beloved grandmother. Should she try and stop the Titanic from colliding with the iceberg and change the course of history forever?
